column4: hi, i installed ubuntu 11.10 but my monitor is stuck on 800x600 no other resolution available on the ui-tool how can i change resolution??
which file should i edit to add resolutions??
hi, i installed ubuntu 11.10 but my monitor is stuck on 640x480 no other resolution available on the ui-tool how can i change resolution??
in the past, i'd wield: dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
